attributes.action: Postpone council tax payments for April and May 2020
attributes.additional_details: Families are already struggling. If they had an extra £100 at this time, it could help them get by!
attributes.background: As the COVID - 19 crisis is hitting families hard at this time. Surely it would be a good idea to relax payments to councils and pay at a later time. 2021?

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
